ovdesc.p: Live file to hold the exception log of parent child trades or orders.

desc.p: This field will hold trade date of parent trade or parent order
Valid Date Format
This field will hold value date of parent trade or parent order
Valid Date Format
This field will hold the total nominal in parent if, parent transaction is customer buy otherwise this field will be total of all child nominal
Standard T24 Amount field
This field will hold the total nominal in parent if, parent transaction is customer sell otherwise this field will be total of all child nominal
Standard T24 Amount field
This field will hold the total interest in parent if, parent transaction is customer buy otherwise this field will be total of all child interest
Standard T24 amount field.
This field will hold the total interest in parent if, parent transaction is customer buy otherwise this field will be total of all child interest
Standard T24 amount field.
This field will hold number of child trades created. Value will be reduced if child trade are deleted or reversed
This field will hold number of child trades authorised. Value will be reduced if child trades are reversed or deleted.
Field to determine whether parent is authorised. This field will be reset if parent is reversed.
Alphabetical characters
List of exception fields from SC.BULK.TRANS.MATCHING that doesn�t match with parent.
Associated multivalue with EXCEPTION.TXN field
Alphabetical characters
List of exception transactions for which exception fields doesn�t match. sub value field associated with EXCEPTION.FIELD.
Alphabetical characters
Field to hold common exceptions such as nominal not matching or interest not matching
Alphabetical characters

STATUS will be updated as PENDING if parent or child are not authorized. STATUS will be updated as COMPLETED if parent and all child are all authorized. STATUS of TRADED is applicable only for records pertaining to SEC.OPEN.ORDER and will be updated on execution of order
Alphabetical characters
This field will hold unique reference common to parent and child
